author: Jacob Gallagher
title: 11 Burning Questions About Men’s Shorts, Answered
text:
1. What does my shorts length say about me?
3 Inches: Alarming
“There’s a guy out there, he’s going to the gym, he’s got some gams to show and he’s happy to,” said Bruce Pask, men’s fashion director at Bergdorf Goodman. Well good for that gym-rat. Those of us without Michelangelo-esque thighs should skip the Daisy Dukes and invest in more...
